## Description
Please include a short summary of the change and which issue is fixed (if any).

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related issue
Closes # (issue number)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have added/updated tests or stories where applicable
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have updated documentation if required
- [ ] I have verified that NO real API keys, provider scripts, or production secrets are included
- [ ] I have verified the app still works in **MOCK** mode (`NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO=true`)
- [ ] I have run the app locally and validated the change

## Notes for reviewers
Anything the reviewer should know (deployment steps, special testing, etc).
